rooms.description: Small foyer to welcome guests with built-in storage.
Spacious living room integrated with an open kitchen layout to facilitate social interactions and daily activities.
Seating area adjacent to the dining table, designed for family meals.
Primary bedroom with a dedicated dressing space and an attached west-facing balcony ensuring natural light in the morning hours as per Vastu.
Guest room also featuring a private balcony overlooking the serene view from the corner plot.

openings.description: To optimize cross ventilation and natural light, with Vastu considerations of proper cardinal alignments.
